mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCM_XS_BigContractAllot (id,specialOpinion, ownerId,BigContractId, reduceContractTime,allocationCode, approvalId,approvalState, sendProductDate,commerceFirstId, commerceCode,commerceName, marketingWay,ownerName,dateOfSigning, createPersion,createDate) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bigContractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reduceContractTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allocationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendProductDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commerceFirstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commerceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commerceName,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{marketingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dateOfSigning,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: UPDATE SCM_XS_BigContractAllot SET specialOpinion=#{specialOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerId=#{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BigContractId=#{bigContractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reduceContractTime=#{reduceContractTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, allocationCode=#{allocationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalId=#{approvalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approvalState=#{approvalState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sendProductDate=#{sendProductDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, commerceFirstId=#{commerceFirstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceCode=#{commerceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commerceName=#{commerceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marketingWay=#{marketingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownerName=#{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dateOfSigning=#{dateOfSigning,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createPersion=#{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createDate=#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id=#{id}
